resources.string:
Hi, My name is Kamlakar. 

I love Cricket. It is my favorite sport. 

Fun fact is that I play Cricket with my kids almost everyday. 

I like reading new books and listening to music. 

I am learning new musical instrument these days, which is Guitar. 

On the professional front, I am a software developer. I work at a software company. 

I also know how to make Android apps. I will be happy to teach you Kotlin programming language to create fantastic Android applications.
